title: Theological Depth Quiz 4
description: Deep theological questions about Noah's Ark - Part 4

questions.text: How does the flood narrative prefigure God's ultimate plan of salvation?

options.text: The ark represents salvation through Christ, preserving the faithful
options.explanation: 1 Peter 3:20-21 connects Noah's salvation through water to baptism and salvation through Christ's resurrection.

options.text: It shows God's anger without redemption
options.explanation: The flood demonstrates both judgment and mercy, pointing to God's redemptive plan.

options.text: It has no connection to salvation history
options.explanation: The New Testament explicitly connects Noah's deliverance to Christian salvation themes.
